translations: n．地震（temblor的复数形式）：地壳内部的突然剧烈震动，通常由地壳内部的应力释放引起。
· The region has experienced several temblors in the past few months.
过去几个月，该地区经历了几次地震。

sentences.sentence: It was one very long one, then short temblors.
sentences.translation: 那是一次时间非常长的地震，后面还跟着一些时间比较短的余震。

sentences.sentence: Thirteen temblors of magnitude 7 or larger have hit Chile since 1973.
sentences.translation: 自1973年以来，智利共发生了13次里氏7级或更高级别的地震。

sentences.sentence: Since 1973, 13 temblors of magnitude 7.0 or greater have occurred there, according to the USGS.
sentences.translation: 据美国地质勘探局说，自1973年以来，那里发生了13次7.0级或以上地震。
